title: [MC1.8][Command_Block][原创]原版雷神斧模组
author: Sao_N
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sao_N 于 2015-8-2 00:19 编辑 

大家好，我是你们曾经那个死去的246= =，不要问我为什么死了，反正你们以后叫我Sao_N或者骚年就可以了{:10_513:}，废话不说了，进入正题。


==================分割线=================
视频
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTI5NjIxODI2OA==.html?from=y1.7-1.2


图：

我们先输入指令（废话）

生成了一条柱子（还是废话）

然后获得了一个铁斧

打谁谁被雷劈

命令
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-21 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-12 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-11 ~10 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"scoreboard players set @a axe 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-10 ~10 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @a uesaxe 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-9 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[score_lll_min=1,type=!Player,r=10] lll -1"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-8 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @a[score_axe_min=1,score_uesaxe_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[score_lll_min=1,type=!Player,r=10] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-7 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] lll 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-6 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=!Player] lll 0 {HurtTime:0s}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-5 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=!Player] lll 1"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-4 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @a axe 1 {SelectedItem:{id:\\"minecraft:iron_axe\\",Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:\\"LightningBolt_axe\\",Lore:[\\"LightningBolt!!!\\"]}}}}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-3 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-2 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-1 ~6 ~3 ~-1 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:iron_axe 1 0 {ench:[{id:34,lvl:32767}],display:{Name:"LightningBolt_axe",Lore:["LightningBolt!!!"]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1670864807,UUIDMost:1670864807,Amount:6.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add lll dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add uesaxe stat.useItem.minecraft.iron_axe"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add axe dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @a axe 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~25 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码

@名人才华
